sec.div: 3.3. Fluorescence Intensity of N-CQDs at Different Dilutions
sec.p: As shown in Figure 4a, we found an excitation peak around 400 nm. When excited at 400 nm, the N-CQDs exhibited strong photoluminescence (PL) emission centered at 546 nm. The fluorescence intensities of N-CQDs at different dilutions were measured by fluorescence spectrometry ( Figure 4b). The fluorescence intensity of N-CQDs diluted 50 times in water was the strongest. Therefore, N-CQDs diluted 50 times in ultrapure water was finally applied for the detection of Ag +.
